summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganLolaVie Sculpting Paste Styling Wand is a high-performance styling paste that delivers flexible, touchable hold and frizz control in a sleek, dual-ended applicator for effortless, mess-free styling anytime, anywhere.
details: DetailsBenefitsSame formula as the full-size Sculpting PasteDual-ended design: one end for precise application, the other for smooth blending and finishing touchesFlexible hold formula: delivers all-day style without feeling stiff or crunchy72-hour frizz protection*99% naturally derivedFor all hair typesColor safe*lab-tested average result vs. untreated multi-ethnic frizzy hairKey IngredientsPomegranate Sterols: Give you that perfectly imperfect style without the sticky situationHold Complex: Blends B-Pro3‚Ñ¢ bond technology, bamboo, birch, and sugar maple saps with kale, carrot, and lemon peptides for piece-y perfectionSuperfruit Complex: A luxe blend of coconut MCTs, amaranthus squalane, and a√ßa√≠ keeps strands hydrated and protected while you serve looksSuper Grains: Chickpea, lentil, and quinoa peptides help seal the cuticle for that signature smooth styleFormulated WithoutSiliconesSulfates (SLS/SLES)ParabensGlutenPhthalatesItem 2643641How To UseStart with dry or slightly damp hair for best results. Twist the base to open. A small amount of styling paste will dispense onto the wand applicator. Glide the wand through sections of hair, focusing on areas you want to tame and style. Insert wand applicator back into tube and twist closed. Pull up on the cap to reveal a dual-sided sculpting brush. Use the soft bristle side to distribute product evenly and smooth flyaways, and the precision rake side to sculpt and define your look.IngredientsLactobacillus/Arundinaria Gigantea Ferment Filtrate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Cetyl Esters, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Behenyl Behenate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Lactobacillus, 2,3-Butanediol, Cladonia Rangiferina Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Punica Granatum Sterols, Salvia Hispanica (Chia) Seed Extract, Phyllostachys Bambusoides Extract, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Coconut Alkanes, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Squalane, Acer Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract, Bambusa Vulgaris Sap Extract, Betula Alba Leaf Juice, Glyceryl Behenate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Parfum (Fragrance)*, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Euterpe Oleracea Sterols, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Extract, Brassica Oleracea Acephala Leaf Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Propylene Carbonate, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Seed Extract, Hydrolyzed Cicer Seed Extract, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract, Bambusa Vulgaris Extract, Linoleic Acid, Oleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Citric Acid, Linalool, Limonene, Citrus Limon Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia Peel Oil, Juniperus Virginiana Oil, Linalyl Acetate, Pinene, Santalol, Citral *Naturally-derived fragrance.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Start with dry or slightly damp hair for best results. Twist the base to open. A small amount of styling paste will dispense onto the wand applicator. Glide the wand through sections of hair, focusing on areas you want to tame and style. Insert wand applicator back into tube and twist closed. Pull up on the cap to reveal a dual-sided sculpting brush. Use the soft bristle side to distribute product evenly and smooth flyaways, and the precision rake side to sculpt and define your look.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I immediately noticed the slight scent to it. It was pleasant and it didn't smell plasticy as some other hair tamer gels I've used. I typically prefer no scent, but Lolavie's scent is pleasant so its good.

When putting it on the hair, it appears white but after you use the wand to spread out the paste and smooth down the hair, the white cannot be seen anymore. I have a lot of flyaways so I needed two layers of the paste (two go arounds) for it to be smooth how I wanted it. My hair isn't left sticky nor stiff, there is only a slight film on my hair which is to be expected as I'm applying a hair tamer paste.

The brush side of the wand is quite useful and essentially smooths out my hair. I used the non bristled side after as instructed, but I didn't notice much of a difference. I used my hand a bit to assist in smoothing out my hair, but the paste leaves a very slight residue (as expected). It is inconvenient having the brush and applicator wands on the same end. I have to essentially apply the paste all first, screw close the applicator, then open the brush to brush down my hair. Normally I like to apply the paste then brush, apply the paste then brush, and so forth, but I am not able to as it would be inconvenient.

After a 100 degree day out of wear, my hair frizzed up a bit, but not as much as it normally would. I'm sure if I put on another layer, my hair would be gelled down better.

I received this product for free from Lolavie for testing and review purposes
faceoff_positive.headline: Good formula

faceoff_negative.comments: I like the product, but I wanted to like this a lot more. Initially, I had a hard time re-opening the product to just open up the comb feature. Each time I dipped the wand back into the bottle, I only got the mascara applicator. After about 4 or 5 tries, I was able to open the comb part of the applicator, by using my fingernail to separate it from the bottom of the wand. The mascara wand did not dispense as much product that I would have liked. It did not weigh down my hair which is a benefit over other products, but as a result it did not provide as much of the "sculpting" benefit.  I would only recommend this version of this product for those looking to provide soft sculpting to edges of hair. Even then it might not providing the sculpting as anticipated. The wand, the mascara brush and the comb end of it, are just too small to get to any other parts of your hair. The product might be more beneficial and user friendly for random flyaway hairs in the current tube, or in a jar or pump to allow for more product to be used. I received this product for free so that I could review it.
faceoff_negative.headline: It works in a pinch
